CutSceneText.Text: You have called me with the essence of my brothers.
Why have you awakened me, Daeva?
Great Kasadrasil, I ask what only you can give,
Understand that what you ask is no easy thing.
Daevas of Flame were not able to melt the ice of centuries...no matter what magics they used.
But as long as my roots do not wither,
the ice will never cover Kurngalfberg completely.
